alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 12:58AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR LIPSCOMB...NORTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON...SOUTHEASTERN HANSFORD... ROBERTS...HEMPHILL AND SOUTHERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 1257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Higgins to 17 miles southeast of Spearman, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Canadian, Miami, Higgins, Wolf Creek Park, Lora, Glazier, Codman and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
